Package com.iontrading.mkv

Class MkvType

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iontrading.mkv.MkvObject
      • com.iontrading.mkv.MkvType
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrivateMkvType
    @Keep
@KeepPublicClassMemberNames
public class MkvType
extends MkvObject
    The MkvType class wraps a ION Type in a Java Object.

    An ION Type

    Unless otherwise noted, passing a null argument to a constructor or method in this class will cause a NullPointerException to be thrown.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MkvType

        public MkvType​(String name,
               String[] fields,
               MkvFieldType[] types)
        throws MkvException
        Constructs a newly allocated MkvType with the given name, fields and types.
        Parameters:
        name - the view name.
        fields - the field names.
        types - the field types.
        Throws:
        MkvException - if name does not represent a valid record identifier.
        IllegalStateException - if the API is not running.
        See Also:
        MkvObject.publish(), MkvObject.unpublish()

      • getFieldIndex

        public int getFieldIndex​(String field)
        Returns the index, within the type's fields set, of a field
        Parameters:
        field - the field name
        Returns:
        the index of the specified field, or a negative value if it is not present

      • getFieldIndexes

        public int[] getFieldIndexes​(String[] fields)
                      throws MkvFieldNotFoundException
        Converts the specified array of field names into an array of field indexes.
        Parameters:
        fields - the field names.
        Returns:
        the array of integers representing the indexes of the specified field names.
        Throws:
        MkvFieldNotFoundException - if a specified field is not present in this type.

      • getFieldNames

        public String[] getFieldNames​(int[] fields)
                       throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Converts the specified array of field indexes into an array of field names.
        Parameters:
        fields - the field indexes.
        Returns:
        the array of names corresponding to the specified indexes
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if any of the indexes exceeds boundaries
